You’re welcome I believe the majority of my colleagues would be as helpful as I do, if not more so hmm... your friend is one of the special cases where some PIs were transferred to certain “desk-work” bureaus (e.g. commercial crime bureau) once they were fresh out of basic training. I remembered that one of the inspectors during my days in auxiliary police academy have encountered similar situation like your friend did. however, I have no clue on the reasons behind such personnel arrangements.

Thanks!

1. 海關要管制既野更廣 例如走私同侵權行為 毒品調查科只會查毒品

2. 一般既暴力案件係EU接 如果有槍既就多數會叫埋反恐特勤 飛虎出動既所需時間耐少少 所以通常都係攻堅+持續長時間既行動先動用到 PTU同巡邏小隊會幫手封鎖現場 疏散人群 做人群管制 如果有需要 PTU會做埋搜索
